articles.title: Planet of Lana Feels Like a Playdead Game That Doesn’t Hate You - IGN
articles.description: Planet of Lana is a beautiful new narrative platformer, which feels like a Playdead game that swapped overt threat for a gorgeous, naturalistic, and crucially hopeful viewpoint.
